addhtmlmetaandtitle-desc: Adds the <seo title="word1,word2" metakeywords="word1,word2,..." metadescription="word1,word2,..." google-site-verification="googlekey" /> tag so you can add to the meta keywords and HTML-title of a wiki-page. If you are lazy just use the short version: <seo title="word1, word2,..." metak="word1, word2,..." metad="word1, word2,..." />.
addhtmlmetaandtitle-empty-attr: <seo> tag must contain at least one non-empty "title" or "metak(eywords)" or "metad(escription)" attribute.
